|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== DNXA-H1 is an 802.11n dual-band 3x3 mini PCIe wifi card which delivers up to 450Mbps data rate. :External Rx filter provides excellent radio rejection against the interfering signal from :the 2nd Wi-Fi on con-current mode without Rx sensitivity degradation.
This device uses the Atheros XB114 reference design.
"(XB114_030)", "2010/05/31", and "48DNXA07.SGB" is silkscreened on the back :of the card in the images provided by '''Unex'''.
This device is presumed to be identical to the [[Wistron NeWeb DNXA-H1|'''Wistron NeWeb''' DNXA-H1]]. :The FCC ID of this product has been assigned to this entry.
Mini PCIe (oversized) - 5mm longer that standard Mini PCIe card
==Links of Interest== [https://www.unex.com.tw/download/577ccfc2bb199/11?token=L4tyqrw2ltOQ9J3EulvDO0ZpgLpaAqxXXR0K9ggA Datasheet]
